system.description: Target's Intelligence and Charisma each drop to 1. The affected creature cannot cast spells, use magic items, read, speak, or understand language. The subject can still fight and use skills that do not require language or spellcasting. The effect can be removed by heal, limited wish, miracle, or wish. A successful save means the spell has no effect.

components.materialDescription: A handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres.
